name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrofans Close Tab by Drag Right Mouse

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Four methods are provided to close tabs easily and quickly, and configuration switches are also provided for each method.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Method 1: Drag Right Mouse and Release.  (Recommend)
Method 2: Click The “CLOSE” Button to Close Tab.
Method 3: Double Right Mouse Click to Close Tab.
Method 4: Click the menu item [Close Current Tab Easily And Quickly] to close current tab.

Each Method Can Switch On/Off thought the Extension Options.

*******************************************************************
We do not collect your personal information, we do not track your personal information.
*******************************************************************
This extension is safe and free.
*******************************************************************
v1.1.2 Fixed a functional missing bug.
v1.1.1 Let the drag right mouse method more easily to cancel.
v1.1 Add feature:  You can click the right context menu item named [Close Current Tab Easily And Quickly] to close current tab.
v1.03 fixed double right click bug.
